name: Jérôme GIRARD
text: I had the pleasure of meeting Mauro when we relocated him from Argentina to Spain to join our team at InnoIT. From the beginning, his strong expertise in .NET stood out, along with his exceptional soft skills. Mauro is a reliable professional with great technical abilities, always willing to share his knowledge and collaborate with the teams.

name: Gina Marie Urizar (Passaretti)
relation: Gina Marie was senior to Mauro but didn't manage Mauro directly
text: I highly recommend Mauro as a software developer, although he did not report directly to me. Mauro consistently demonstrated a remarkable level of professionalism and dedication while working with our client, Intelliflo. His excellent teamwork skills were evident as he consistently supported and encouraged his colleagues, fostering a positive and collaborative work environment. Mauro's commitment to continuous improvement was notable, as he actively sought to enhance both his technical expertise and soft skills, ultimately contributing to the overall success of our projects.

name: Jay McMeans
text: Mauro was a great asset on my team. He always had a great attitude and a willingness to jump in and get the job done. Mauro is a constant learner, and even if he is not knowledgeable in an area, he does what it takes to learn it. Mauro was not given permission by me to resign and move to another company. While he left a hole on one of my teams, he will nicely fill holes on another company's team.

name: Gonzalo Racigh
position: Project Leader - Scrum Master at TECSO Coop
relation: Gonzalo worked with Mauro on the same team
text: Mauro is a professional with strong technical skills and knowledge of various development tools. He’s responsible and flexible, ready to take on all kinds of tasks. He’s proactive and always willing to help his teammates solve problems.
